front.title: A YANG Data Model for SD-WAN VPN Service Delivery

abstract.t: This document provides a YANG data model for SD-WAN VPN service. A SD-WAN VPN service is a service offered by a Service Provider network to provide an overlay connectivity between different locations of a customer network or between a customer network and an external network, such as Internet or Private Cloud network. The model can be utilized by an service orchestrator of a Service Provider to initiate a connectivity request.
